mapper.select: select r.record_ticket_price as recordTicketPrice , r.record_md_price as recordMdPrice , r.record_score as recordScore , r.record_reg_dt as recordRegDt , r.record_mod_dt as recordModDt , r.record_id as recordId , r.movie_id as movieId , m.movie_ko_nm as movieKoNm , m.movie_en_nm as movieEnNm , r.member_pk as memberPk , r.record_watch_dt as recordWatchAt , r.del_yn as delYn , r.record_content as recordContent , r.record_cinema as recordCinema , r.record_seat as recordSeat , r.record_with as recordWith , r.record_tag as recordTag from record r left join movie m on r.movie_id = m.movie_id where member_pk = #{memberPk}
